name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This update adds a few new features to the mod, and lots of improvements. 'Blood Pacts' are now listed in the cube menu and you can find out more about these set fusion items in our Discord. Some of the more difficult/annoying bugs have finally been fixed as well, such as Poison and Ded'domer crashes. I hope you continue to enjoy the mod's evolution - have fun!

I'd like to personally thank all the recent support from the Patreon subscribers and let you know it's truly appreciated. You guys have shown me how many people really want this project to succeed, and give me motivation to work that much harder and longer. You guys really are rockstars, and I can only hope some of my recent additions help showcase my gratitude.
